message.content:
cs.ET, cs.NE, cs.EM, cs.MA, cs.ES

The paper discusses spintronics and specifically focuses on spin-orbit torque (SOT) within different research groups. This topic falls under the category of Emerging Technologies (cs.ET) as it deals with a relatively new and emerging field of research. The paper also mentions neuromorphic computing, which is a subfield of Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE). The use of spin in electronics also involves the study of electromagnetism, which falls under the category of Electromagnetics (cs.EM). The paper also discusses device and circuit level design, which falls under the category of Microarchitecture (cs.MA). Finally, the paper mentions futuristic applications of SOT-based technology, which could potentially fall under the category of Embedded Systems (cs.ES).
